body.p: First page of letter missing.to see your schoolField Lane Ragged School. See CD’s moving description of his visit in 'A Sleep to Startle Us', Household Words 4 (13 March 1852): 577-80.one night. Will it be open next Monday or Tuesday evening: and at what hour would it be best to come? If it be not open on either of these evenings, will you tell me on what nights next week, it will be open?
